Revise the data visualization in the "Category Distribution" section to include a variety of chart types (not just bar charts) tailored to each category. For each category, provide multiple, clear, and visually distinct graphs that allow users to drill down into individual values and easily compare data. Ensure all charts are visually appealing, intuitive, and enhance value comparison. Prioritize clarity, comfort, and effective data presentation. Refer to [Data Visualization Best Practices](https://www.data-to-viz.com/) for guidance on chart selection and design.work with top python visualization , libraries such as Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Plotly to create these visualizations,  review the values add comments - include also tabular representations where appropriate - for each category that has important unique values and show also the comparison to the sanity.
